abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism to signal Pseudowire (PW) statusmessages using an PW associated channel (ACh). Such a mechanism issuitable for use where no PW dynamic control plane exits, known asstatic PWs, or where a Terminating Provider Edge (T-PE) needs to senda PW status message directly to a far end T-PE. The mechanism allowsPW OAM message mapping and PW redundancy to operate on static PWs.
